page.title: 12Old People Link With School
page.content: An aim of Sugar Hill School is to make pupils socially aware and to encourage community involvement.At Christmas 1984 therefore a link was forged between pupils and the elderly of Shafto House.Pupils decorated the Old People's Home with Christmas Art work, performed a Carol Service and gave gifts of crocus bulbs planted earlier. Matron,staff and residents enjoyed it so much that an Easter visit was arranged,which followed the same form. In July,pupils and teachers donated flowers, wrapped individually and these were given to the residents by the children as they left,after singing their favourite hymns and songs. The link is now very strong,and beneficial to both the residents and the children.It is hoped that it will continue on a termly basis.
